stack.description:
The clearpath_turtlebot stack provides a central repository of software and launch files intended for deployment on the Turtlebot.
With a Kinect, try exploring, following people or following another turtlebot:
roslaunch turtlebot_kinect explore.launch roslaunch turtlebot_kinect track_person.launch roslaunch turtlebot_train train.launch
stack.author: Maintained by Mike Purvis
